song.title: Open Heaven
song.lyrics:
[Intro] .D E F#m A/C#
[1] . A/C# D | E | F#m Signs and wonders from above . A/C# D | E | F#m When You pour out Your Spirit . A/C# D | E | F#m On the old and the young . A/C# D | E | F#m In the power of Your presence
[C] .A/C# D E F#m Holy Spirit rain, falling like a flood .A/C# D E F#m Break upon my praise, as I sing of Your love || .A/C# D E F#m Holy Spirit fire, burn within my soul . A/C# D E | F#m As I call on Your name . A/C# D E | F#m As I call on Your name
--- [2] . A/C# D | E | F#m Dreams and visions of the Son . A/C# D | E | F#m As we stand in Your presence . A/C# D | E | F#m Revelations of Your love . A/C# D | E | F#m As we look to the heavens
[Instrumental] .D E A/C# D
[B1] .D E O Holy Spirit, burn like a fire .A/C# D All consuming me, consume me .D Here in Your presence .E Lord I surrender .A/C# D To Your glory, for Your glory
[B2] .D E Living water, river wild in me .A/C# D Immerse me in Your mercy .D E Open heaven, crashing over me .A/C# D Restore me in Your glory
song.presentation: 1 C 2 C B1 B2 B1 C
